availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ambrose G. Bush (Clark County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Hampton Bush in Clark County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1843. Father of Minerva Bush. Married to Martha J. Hampton Bush in Clark County, Kentucky, on May 22, 1849. Father of Kitty Bush, Amira Bush, Christy Bush, Nannie Bush, Valentine Bush, James H. Bush, and Oliver Bush. Farmer in Clark County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Clark County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Clark County in 1860.
